flavorText: The bones of Jund's dead resurfaced in Naya, poisoning the jungle and killing the sunseeders' crops.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Gebeine der Toten aus Jund kamen in Naya zurück an die Oberfläche, vergifteten den Dschungel und vernichteten das Getreide der Sonnensamer.
foreignData.name: Verdorbene Wurzeln
foreignData.text:
Wald-oder-Ebenenverzauberung
Immer wenn das verzauberte Land getappt wird, verliert sein Beherrscher 2 Lebenspunkte.

foreignData.flavorText: Los huesos de los muertos de Jund reaparecieron en Naya, envenenando la selva y matando las cosechas de los siembrasoles.
foreignData.name: Raíces corrompidas
foreignData.text:
Encantar bosque o llanura.
Siempre que la tierra encantada sea girada, su controlador pierde 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Quand ils refirent surface sur Naya, les ossements des morts de Jund empoisonnèrent la jungle et tuèrent les récoltes des planteurs de grain solaire.
foreignData.name: Racines corrompues
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : forêt ou plaine
À chaque fois que le terrain enchanté devient engagé, son contrôleur perd 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Le ossa dei morti di Jund riaffiorarono nel terreno di Naya, avvelenandone la giungla e devastando il raccolto dei seminatori solari.
foreignData.name: Radici Corrotte
foreignData.text:
Incanta Foresta o Pianura
Ogniqualvolta la terra incantata viene TAPpata, il suo controllore perde 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: ナヤに再び姿を現したジャンドの死者の骨は、密林を毒し、太陽の種蒔きの実りを失わせた。
foreignData.name: 腐敗した根
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（森か平地）
エンチャントされている土地がタップ状態になるたび、それのコントローラーは２点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText: Os ossos dos mortos de Jund ressurgiram em Naya, envenenando a selva e matando as plantações de heliósporos.
foreignData.name: Raízes Corrompidas
foreignData.text:
Encantar Floresta ou Planície
Toda vez que o terreno encantado for virado, seu controlador perderá 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Кости мертвецов с Джанда оказались на Найе, отравив джунгли и загубив посевы солнечных семян.
foreignData.name: Разлагающиеся Корни
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать Лес или Равнину
Каждый раз, когда зачарованная земля поворачивается, контролирующий ее игрок теряет 2 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText: 勇得亡者的骨头在纳雅苏醒，毒化丛林，让日种的谷物死亡。
foreignData.name: 根部腐化
foreignData.text:
树林结界或平原结界
每当受此结界的地成为横置时，其操控者失去2点生命。

name: Corrupted Roots
originalText:
Enchant Forest or Plains
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

rulings.text: Corrupted Roots can enchant only a Forest or a Plains. It checks the enchanted land’s subtypes, not its name. If at any time the enchanted land is neither a Forest nor a Plains (due to Unstable Frontier’s ability, perhaps), Corrupted Roots is put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action.
Corrupted Roots doesn’t care why the enchanted land becomes tapped. If that land changes from being untapped to being tapped for any reason, the ability will trigger.

text:
Enchant Forest or Plains
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
